mapper.select: SELECT c.id as id_canjeado, c.total as total_canjeado, c.descuento as descuento_canjeado, c.fecha_registro as fecha_registro_canjeado, n.cif as cif_negocio, n.email as email_negocio, n.nombre as nombre_negocio, n.direccion as direccion_negocio, n.valor_total as valor_total_negocio, t.descripcion as descripcion_tipo, v.valor_total as valor_total_vale, v.qr as qr_vale, v.fecha_limite as fecha_limite_vale, u.nombre as nombre_usuario, u.apellidos as apellidos_usuario, u.documento as documento_usuario, u.email as email_usuario FROM canjeados c JOIN vales v ON c.vale = v.id JOIN usuarios u ON v.usuario = u.id JOIN negocios n ON c.negocio = n.id JOIN tipo_negocio t ON n.tipo = t.id WHERE c.id = #{idCanjeado}
